features: 3-in-1 digital camera/PC-web video camera and keychain
Take up to 70 photos and video chat with friends on the internet
Also comes with a special USB cable and a 1-year warranty
body.description: Capture the moment without having to carry a big camera with this small Digital Keychain Camera that features a 3-in-1 digital camera/PC-web video camera and keychain. Take up to 70 photos and video chat with friends on the internet. The camera is equipped with built-in SDRAM; if you want to download the photos into the computer, you are only required to connect the USB cable, and if you want to use the built-in PC camera function, you can hold video conference via the internet to have a face-to-face online chat with others. The included PhoTags photo editing software allows you to manage your photos, enhance your photos, add active captions, locate and organize your photos and collections, and share your photos. The camera also comes with a special USB cable and a 1-year warranty. The compact camera weighs less than 1 pound!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice camera. will not fit if your computer has a regular large cd player
reviews.reviewText: didnt fit in my computers CD player. gave it to a neice for christmas. she loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter as a beginner camera. I thought it would last a little longer than it did helping her to learn the basic fundamentals of camera function and transfer of pictures. Wanted to wait for a more expensive camera until she knew a little more about what she's doing with a camera. But, you get what you pay for and less in this case.It broke after only a couple hours of use. It took about 15-20 pictures, she tried to plug the cord into the camera and that part broke. It's like there's nothing in the camera to stop the plug from going back into the camera. And, we can't get the camera open without actually damaging the housing unit. Very cheaply made, a waste of money, and an upset little girl on Christmas day. And, she was gentle with it taking care of her new prized possession.Can't rate the software or anything else since we couldn't even get the camera plugged in to transfer her pictures or try out the software. It's going in the trash and we'll be taking advantage of the after Christmas sales to get a better name brand beginner camera.Don't waste your time or money on this camera......

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice toy. Non functional. Couldn't get or view any pictures taken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2016

reviews.reviewTitle: It's not great quality, but still super cool!
reviews.reviewText: This camera isn't very good, please don't buy it if you think it's going to be cute or Y2K. The photos out of it are at a max 640x480, which is super low, unfortunately. Putting this aside, it's super fun to shoot with. The super small size, and the fact that it's new-old stock (new as in old stock that hasn't ever been used) from 2005. This also means it only works with Windows XP and older, which is a bit of a struggle, but still super fun to experiment with. At least the one I got fully works, and is pink as shown, and comes in its original packaging from 2005. Really for a brand new digital camera, you can't complain for $5.99!!
